attributes.action: Hold a Referendum to make Null the acts of union 1706/07.
attributes.additional_details: For centuries the British establishment has controlled the nations of England, Northern Ireland, scotland and Wales. Following a successful Referendum the houses of parliament will be immediately closed. Scotland, Wales, Northen Ireland to take 100% immediate control of their countries from their parliaments. An English parliament will be setup outside of London in Hull. This parliament will work to uphold the English constitution and English Bill of Rights.
attributes.background:
ref to be held to make null The Acts of Union 1706/07 This will result in: 

British establishment being immediately dissolved. 

Immediate exit of the E.U and U.N 

All worldwide agreements made by the establishment torn up. 

A return to common law. 

The English constitution upheld.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

Repealing the Act of Union would not lead to the changes your petition sets out.
	
You might like to sign this petition calling for an English Parliament:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/556380
